body:
## What's Changed
* Fixed [RUBY-28068](https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/RUBY-28068)
* [RUBY-23972](https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/RUBY-23972) Improve ruby-debug-ide documentation by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/173
* Added option to skip watting for start command by @FabioMR in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/167
* unix socket support by @tdyas in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/183
* gemspec: Drop defunct property rubyforge_project by @olleolleolle in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/190
* check if debase installed (already_installed doesn't work) by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/142

## New Contributors
* @FabioMR made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/167
* @tdyas made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/183
* @olleolleolle made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/190

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/compare/v0.7.0...v0.7.3

## What's Changed
* require thread_alias in starter by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/141
* check if block given before yield in xml's print_element by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/143
* new hash item presentation, lets add objectId of a hash key to the xml by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/148
* notify debugger about gdb_wrapper pid to kill it when debugging finished by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/149
* gemfile reworked by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/150
* Fixed syntax error on ruby 1.8 by @encyphered in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/154
* Revert "notify debugger about gdb_wrapper pid to kill it when debuggi… by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/156
* Added 1.8.7 to travis (and fixes for 1.8.7) by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/157
* Install dependencies into the same root as debugger itself by @hurricup in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/172

## New Contributors
* @encyphered made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/154
* @hurricup made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/172

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/compare/v0.6.1...v0.7.0

## What's Changed
* check if block given before yield in xml's print_element by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/143
* new hash item presentation, lets add objectId of a hash key to the xml by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/148
* notify debugger about gdb_wrapper pid to kill it when debugging finished by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/149

* Fixed syntax error on ruby 1.8 by @encyphered in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/154
* Revert "notify debugger about gdb_wrapper pid to kill it when debuggi… by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/156

* @encyphered made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/154

name: 0.7.0.beta4
body:
## What's Changed
* require thread_alias in starter by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/141


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/compare/v0.7.0.beta3...v0.7.0.beta4

## What's Changed
* Ruby attach to process by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/82
* Choose lldb over gdb and find proper extension of library by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/83
* refactoring: separated debuggers and util methods by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/85
* Some changes by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/86
* fixes for sudo issue + some small changes by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/87
* exec monkey patch fix by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/88
* uncoding for >2.0 fixed (RUBY-15434) by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/94
* cleanup by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/104
* zeus deadlock fix by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/103
* inspect memory limit fix by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/100
* Set tl and ml for calculating self.to_s by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/109
* Hash with long-computable `inspect` fix by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/111
* attach to child processes by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/108
* show the main object for toplevel by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/110
* jruby and error class fix by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/116
* set evaluation timeout for child processes by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/123
* Don't use exec_with_allocation for old ruby versions by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/119
* Implementation of exec_with_allocation_control without exceptions by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/125
* changed require 'objectspace' to include ObjectSpace by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/129
* 2.5.0 does not produce an empty statement by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/127
* tests fixes by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/131
* deleted check if instance has `object_id` method by @ViugiNick in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/132

## New Contributors
* @equivalence1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/82

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/compare/v0.6.0...v0.6.1

body:
Attach to process support

## What's Changed
* Ruby attach to process by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/82
* Choose lldb over gdb and find proper extension of library by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/83
* refactoring: separated debuggers and util methods by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/85
* Some changes by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/86
* fixes for sudo issue + some small changes by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/87
* exec monkey patch fix by @equivalence1 in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/88

## New Contributors
* @equivalence1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/pull/82

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ruby-debug/ruby-debug-ide/commits/v0.6.1.beta4
